resources.string: Hi! My name is Sofia Helena Barros, and although people usually write my name without H, you can call me as you find more comfortable (✿◠‿◠) .

I am someone who likes to observe, to be curious about my surroundings and to inquire. Although people often think that I speak very little, in reality, before I do anything, I like to plan down to the smallest detail. This may seem exhausting, but it has allowed me to speak another language, to be passionate about science and to start learning programming.
If you liked my work and wish to contact me, you will find my contact information below. Thanks for reading!
